name: Galaxy Shooter (Rahul Shastry D)
description:
• This is a 2D game named Galaxy Shooter.
  • You have to save yourself from getting hit by the enemy spaceship.
  • You will have total of 3 lives.
  • You will get 3 powerups namely speed,shield,tripple shot.
  • This game works for 16:9 resolution landscape smartphone screen.
  • This is my first ever game I created using Unity in year 2018 and the credit goes to Mr.Jonathan WeinBerger for his wonderful course on udemy .Ty sir!!Learnt a lot from you.
